abstract: Carl Icahn has said that his corporate agitations have created $50 billion in shareholder value over the last few years. But so far, Motorola isn’t feeling the Icahn Effect.
lead_paragraph: Carl Icahn has said that his corporate agitations have created $50 billion in shareholder value over the last few years. But so far, Motorola isn’t feeling the Icahn Effect.

headline.main: Motorola Still Not Getting the Icahn Lift
